stimulusHtml:
A perfectly competitive firm hires three workers in a perfectly competitive labor market. The marginal products of the three workers are shown in the table below.

Which of the following will be true?
choicesHtml: Each worker will receive a wage based on the marginal product of the last worker hired.
Each worker will receive a wage based on the marginal product of the first worker hired.
Each worker will receive a wage based on the average of the marginal products of the workers.
